artist: Pierre Bonnard; Published for Ambroise Vollard, Paris, France
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Sargent Pillsbury, Sr.
image_copyright: Â© Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F ADAGP%2C Paris
provenance: Vollard before WWI (several times at MIA and U of M)
text: This is the view from the window of Bonnard's studio in Montmartre near the Place de Clichy. The artist was deeply attached to his neighborhood during the 1890s, and regularly depicted the area in his prints and paintings.
title: Houses in the Courtyard
